title: Baidu Stock Plunges as Military AI Tests Cast Shadow on Future Prospects
description: In a surprising turn of events, Baidu, the Chinese tech giant primarily known for its search engine, witnessed a significant dip in its stock value following revelations that its artificial-intelligence chatbot, Ernie Bot, underwent testing by a laboratory affiliated with the Chinese military. The company’s American depositary receipts experienced a 4.2% decline in premarket trading, […]
